about_the_game:
In this fast-paced survival shooter, space mechanic Chelsea Crisp fights off hordes of alien enemies, with some help from her elite squad members! This is an arcade style 2D shooter similar to classic video games from the 90's.

The game is currently in pre-alpha. What you play in the demo build is not close to the final game and it is only to be seen as a proof of concept.

👽Main Game Features:

Anime style pixel art

Limited movement character control

Bonus levels that change up gameplay

Story Modes featuring 100+ levels to play. Each level will have a different enemy introduced.

Diverse set of goals for level completion.

Call in assist characters that become available throughout the game. Use them at the right time to get the upper hand.

Battle many bosses! Unlock harder versions of each boss with different attack patterns and animations by completing certain conditions during battle!

Upgrade skills, stats, and weapons by collecting special sodas for upgrade points.

name: Alien Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz, 2801 Mhz, 4 Core(s), 8 Logical Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Fast-paced survival shooter where space mechanic Chelsea Crisp fights off hordes of alien invaders. Upgrade, jump, dodge, and blast your way through many levels of this humorous 90's style anime pixel adventure.
